titles.title: Fry Scholarship Enhancement Act of 2015

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program to cover recipients of the Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
5/22/2015--Introduced. Fry Scholarship Enhancement Act of 2015
Includes under the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program (public-private contributions for educational assistance in addition to post-9/11 educational assistance) the child of an individual who, on or after September 11, 2001, dies in the line of duty while serving on active duty.
